title: 1980 Mercedes-Benz 450SL
description: This 1980 Mercedes-Benz 450SL was initially delivered to Mercedes-Benz of El Cajon, California, and is said to have since remained registered in that state and Arizona through the seller's purchase in 2024. Finished in Manilla Beige over Dark Brown MB-Tex upholstery, the car is powered by a 4.5-liter V8 paired with a three-speed automatic transmission. Equipment includes a dark brown soft top, a removable hardtop, 14" Bundt alloy wheels, fog lights, a cassette stereo, electric windows, cruise control, and air conditioning. Work performed under current ownership is said to have included replacing the tires, brake pads, tie rods, and power steering pump. This R107 is offered with manufacturer's literature, service records, spare parts, a car cover, and a clean Arizona title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a 1980 Mercedes-Benz 450SL at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #179,779.

This R107 is offered with manufacturer’s literature, service records, spare parts, a car cover, and a clean Arizona title in the seller’s name. Additional exterior equipment includes fog lights, a power antenna, and chrome-accented bumpers and trim. The 4.5-liter V8 features Bosch K-Jetronic fuel injection and was factory rated at 160 horsepower and 230 lb-ft of torque. The power steering pump was reportedly replaced in preparation for the sale. Additional exterior equipment includes fog lights, a power antenna, and chrome-accented bumpers and trim.
